# tk-radio-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                   | Type                         | Default        |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | -------------- |
| `direction`    | `direction`     | The direction of the radio buttons.                                           | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"` | `'horizontal'` |
| `invalid`      | `invalid`       | Indicates whether the input is in an invalid state                            | `boolean`                    | `false`        |
| `label`        | `label`         | Defines the label for the element.                                            | `string`                     | `undefined`    |
| `position`     | `position`      | Determines the position of the radio group and label.                         | `"left" \| "right"`          | `'left'`       |
| `showAsterisk` | `show-asterisk` | Displays a red asterisk (*) next to the label for visual emphasis.            | `boolean`                    | `false`        |
| `spread`       | `spread`        | Determines whether the radios will spread evenly across the horizontal space. | `boolean`                    | `false`        |
| `type`         | `type`          | Determines the appearance types of radios.                                    | `"card" \| "default"`        | `'default'`    |
| `value`        | `value`         | The value of the input.                                                       | `any`                        | `undefined`    |


## Events

| Event       | Description                         | Type               |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `tk-change` | Emitted when the value has changed. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
